regexCodeList.string: Wirren applied.
Your extremities tingle most unusually for a minute and your movements take on a sparkling celerity.
Harfy applied.
Your wounds are too great for a mere cleansing of the blood to be effective.
Quarri applied.
Ucklice applied.
You feel beating of the heart of a stag in your breast.
Carnia applied.
Your nerves tingle.
Visions of self, young and old, parade through your memory.
Siriena ingested.
Sata ingested.
Your body swells all over, great lumps of fat appearing everywhere. You have doubled in size!
Breldiar ingested.
Your resistance to magical enchantment is temporarily heightened.
Kathkusa ingested.
You feel your muscles tingle invigoratingly.
Witan ingested.
You find that the snow-white leaf of witan has no effect on you.
Madabril ingested.
You do not have plague, so the madabril has been wasted.
Tyrlar ingested.
The fruity taste invigorates you, banishing pain from your mind.
Lestagii ingested.
You feel a thousand eyes looking upon you, piercing your darkest thoughts.
Iorthir ingested.
Your eyes sparkle as a light springs forth in your mind. You are able to see by a sense other than sight.
Athillias ingested.
Gylvir ingested.
You lick your lips tenderly and shiver with a sudden chill.
Courgia ingested.
Denallo ingested.
The cleansing effects of the denallo bark course through your veins.
Ollso ingested.
A deep but almost inaudible roar rises in your throat.
Alethe ingested.
Rellick ingested.
No discernible effect is felt as the rellick herb metabolises.
Megillos smoked.
Mental restoratives sooth your weary mind.
Arkasu smoked.
Echianta smoked.
Echianta smoked.
The effects of the breldiar herb are nullified.
Furglewort applied.
The herb does not appear to have any effect - ominous is it not?
You begin to feel slightly strange.
You knees go weak, and your sight distorts, growing fuzzy.
You collapse, and your mind fills with strange imagery.
You see a dark hill exploding into flame, the forest glowing red with fire.
Stars coalesce to form a figure eight in the night sky.
A glowing blade falls into a yellow fire, sparking as it falls.
A tree grows from the inside out, distorting into the form of a dragon and opening its great mouth to engulf you.
The blade falls, exploding into a million pieces in the fire.

Finally, your vision returns, the room around you blending into view. You lie still for a few minutes, trying to remember what you have seen andunderstand its meaning, trembling with shock. At last you stand up, and shaking yourself continue on your way.
You shake your head and feel it free of the last, lingering effects of the furglewort herb.
Kelventari applied.
You feel the colour rushing from your pale cheeks.
You prepare to wax.
You surround yourself in a celestial light, revealing a little of the splendour of your inner spirit.
You are surrounded by an aura of divine light.
You are able to wax light and wane.
Your splendid aura has worn off.
Attanar applied.
You feel your raging fever subside in front of your very eyes.
The effects of the cold resistance wears off.
You have limited immunity to cold attack.
Aldaka applied.
You feel no abnormal after-effects.
The cloud of darkness is lifted from your mind.
You are blind and cannot see.
You are afflicted by blindness.
You clamp your eyelids shut with great force.
You force your eyelids open.
You are blind, and cannot see anything.

Trigger.name: prompt: blind
Trigger.script: prompt.status = matches[6] if string.find(prompt.status, "b") then status.blind = true else status.blind = false end statuscheck()

regexCodeList.string: Pouch #(.*) contains (\d|\d+) batches of Aldaka.
(\d|\d+) Aldaka out.
(\d|\d+) Aldaka in.
The world about you falls into darkness; you have gone blind.

Alias.name: delete old profiles
Alias.script:
deleteOldProfiles(matches[3], matches[2]=="maps")
--Syntax examples: "delete old profiles" -> deletes profiles older than 31 days -- "delete old maps 10" -> deletes maps older than 10 days

Alias.name: `echo
Alias.script:
local s = matches[2]
s = string.gsub(s, "%$", "
") feedTriggers("
" .. s .. "
") echo("
")

Alias.name: run lua code
Alias.script:
local f,e = loadstring("return "..matches[2]) if not f then f,e = assert(loadstring(matches[2])) end
local r = f() if r ~= nil then display(r) end

Alias.name: ^preparer (.*) (.*)$
Alias.script: preparer.herb = matches[2] preparer.amount = matches[3] send("prepare "..preparer.herb) preparer.counter = preparer.amount - 1 if preparer.counter > 0 then preparer.timer = tempTimer(3, [[expandAlias("preparer "..preparer.herb.." "..preparer.counter) ]]) cecho("Remaining: "..preparer.counter) end

Alias.name: ^picker (.*) (.*)$
Alias.script:
picker.herb = matches[2] picker.amount = matches[3] send("pick "..picker.herb) picker.counter = picker.amount - 1 if picker.counter > 0 then picker.timer = tempTimer(3, [[expandAlias("picker "..picker.herb.." "..picker.counter) ]]) cecho("Remaining: "..picker.counter) else
end

Script.name: deleteOldProfiles script
Script.script:
function deleteOldProfiles(keepdays_arg, delete_maps)
--[[ Deletes old profiles/maps in the "current"/"map" folders of the Mudlet home directory. The following files are NOT deleted: - Files newer than the amount of days specified as an argument to deleteOldProfiles(), or 31 days if not specified. - One file for every month before that. Specifically: The first available file of every month prior to this. Setting the second argument to true will delete maps instead of profiles. (e.g. deleteOldProfiles(10, true)) --]]
local keepdays = tonumber(keepdays_arg) or 31 local profile_table = {} local used_last_mod_months = {} local slash = (string.char(getMudletHomeDir():byte()) == "/") and "/" or "\\" local dirpath = getMudletHomeDir()..slash..(delete_maps and "map" or "current") local delnum = 0
-- Traverse the profiles folder and create a table of files: for filename in lfs.dir(dirpath) do if filename~="." and filename~=".." then profile_table[#profile_table+1] = {name = filename, last_mod = lfs.attributes(dirpath..slash..filename, "modification")} end end
-- Sort the table according to last modification date from old to new: table.sort(profile_table, function (a,b) return a.last_mod < b.last_mod end)
echo(string.format("\nDeleting old %s. Files newer than %d days and one profile for every month before that will be kept.", delete_maps and "maps" or "profiles", keepdays)) for i,v in ipairs(profile_table) do local days = math.floor(os.difftime(os.time(), v.last_mod)/86400) local last_mod_month = os.date("%Y/%m", v.last_mod) if days > keepdays then -- For profiles older than X days, check if we already kept a table for this month: if not table.contains(used_last_mod_months, last_mod_month) then -- If not, do nothing and mark this month as "kept". used_last_mod_months[#used_last_mod_months+1] = last_mod_month else -- Otherwise remove the file: local success, errorstring = os.remove(dirpath..slash..v.name) if success then delnum = delnum + 1 else cecho("\n<red>ERROR: "..errorstring) end end end end echo(string.format("\nDeletion complete. %d/%d files were removed successfully.", delnum, #profile_table)) end

Script.name: functions
Script.script:
------------------------------------------------- -- Put your Lua functions here. -- -- -- -- Note that you can also use external Scripts -- ------------------------------------------------- function captured() selectString(line,1) fg('spring_green') bg('black') resetFormat() end
function herbwait()
end
function onMapLine() local line = getCurrentLine() local isLastLine = string.findPattern(line, "Map depicts .* environs with your location highlighted") if(isLastLine) then --deleteLine() --killTrigger(maplineTrig) else selectCurrentLine() copy() appendBuffer("minimap") --deleteLine() end end
function recovery() if status.blind == true then if status.herbwait == false and aldakacount >= 1 then send("outp aldaka;apply aldaka") elseif sightsips >= 1 then send("@drink sight") else send("open eyes") end end end

Script.name: variables
Script.script:
------------------------------------------------- -- Put your Lua functions here. -- -- -- -- Note that you can also use external Scripts -- ------------------------------------------------- picker = {} picker.herb = "herb" picker.amount = 0 picker.counter = 0 picker.timer = "timer" preparer = {} preparer.herb = "herb" preparer.amount = 0 preparer.counter = 0 preparer.timer = "timer"
status = {} status.kelventariwane = false
--Testing aldakacount = 0 sightsips = 0 status.herbwait = false status.blind = false prompt = {} prompt.status = "null" combat = {} combat.target = "null" combat.weapon = "null" combat.bow = "null"

Script.name: windows
Script.script:
------------------------------------------------- -- Put your Lua functions here. -- -- -- -- Note that you can also use external Scripts -- ------------------------------------------------- statuswindow = Geyser.MiniConsole:new({ name="statuswindow", x="70%", y="0%", wrapAt = 100, width="29%", height="100%", })
promptwindow = Geyser.MiniConsole:new({ name="promptwindow", x="0%", y="95 %", wrapAt = 150, width="70%", height="5%", })

Script.name: picker.preparer
Script.script:
------------------------------------------------- -- Put your Lua functions here. -- -- -- -- Note that you can also use external Scripts -- ------------------------------------------------- picker = {} picker.herb = "herb" picker.amount = 0 picker.counter = 0 picker.timer = "timer"
preparer = {} preparer.herb = "herb" preparer.amount = 0 preparer.counter = 0 preparer.timer = "timer"

Script.name: statuscheck
Script.script:
------------------------------------------------- -- Put your Lua functions here. -- -- -- -- Note that you can also use external Scripts -- ------------------------------------------------- function statuscheck() clearUserWindow("statuswindow") statuswindow:setColor("black") statuswindow:cecho("
| <white>STATUS WINDOW<grey>") statuswindow:cecho("
| ") statuswindow:cecho("
|<green> MY TARGET IS: <cyan>"..combat.target) statuswindow:cecho("
|<green> MY WEAPON IS: <cyan>"..combat.weapon) statuswindow:cecho("
|<green> MY BOW IS: <cyan>"..combat.bow) statuswindow:cecho("
| ") statuswindow:cecho("
| <red> AFFLICTIONS")
--Example --if player.status.clumsiness == true then statuswindow:echoLink("
| AFFLICT: Clumsiness ARK", [[expandAlias("ark")]], "Herb: Arkasu", true) end end
